name: The Cinder Pit
description:
After recently suffering a severe mining accident, a lone miner is trying to make his way to the afterlife. Battle your way through hordes of spiders and fellow ghosts all on your quest of salvation all while in limbo.

Basic Controls:

W / Up Arrow - Jump

A / Left Arrow - Left

D / Right Arrow - Right 

F / Left Click - Attack towards mouse direction

Week: 133 Wall Jump

We Cant Upload Screenshots yet because the itch image servers are down currently

This game is a very early stage we only started monday and we hope you can understand. We have many things we would like to do in the future and we hope you enjoy.

Credits:
